header.title: Define the Form type you want to create
header.description: Each one has specific characteristics and different forms of display on your Website, Blog or E-commerce. Choose the type that best suits your needs and goals. Any questions? Press

1.title: Classic
1.description: Share your Form in many ways: embed it on your Website, include it in a Facebook Tab or share it through a URL.

2.title: Pop-up
2.description: Make your Form show up right in the center of the screen when the rules you've defined happen. Users must close it or fill it in for it to disappear.

3.title: WhatsApp Pop-up
3.description: Add a floating button to redirect your Website visitors to WhatsApp, after they submit the Form.
